name: Opposition & Allies
title: Coffee and Comments: EPA's Endangerment Finding · Mobilize
description:
Have you heard of the Endangerment Finding? 

The Trump Administration is attacking limits on climate-warming pollution, putting us in danger. The Endangerment Finding is the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency’s longstanding determination that greenhouse gases — which are released when we burn fossil fuels — endanger public health and welfare.

The administration is basing their actions on a report they commissioned by climate skeptics, many with ties to the fossil fuel industry. It's clear they want to undermine the mountain of scientific evidence supporting our strongest protections. 

Join us with your best cup of coffee to fight back against this unlawful attack on climate progress. EDF's regulatory expert, Peter Zalzal, will be joining us to share his perspective and more information on why we need to step up to defend the Endangerment Finding.
